issues.title: Election Integrity
issues.description: Strong supporter of election security, claims 2020 election had irregularities

issues.description: Adamant defender of gun ownership, opposes gun control measures

issues.description: Supports strict immigration enforcement, advocates for border wall completion

issues.description: Pro-life supporter, advocates for restricting abortion access

issues.title: Anti-Critical Race Theory
issues.description: Opposes teaching of critical race theory in schools
